title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver. The car is considered a means of transportation that was invented in the past and is constantly updated until now. It is not uncommon to see a car driving without a driver driving it. So what about the interpretation of a dream about driving a car without a driver in a dream? This question raises many questions in the dreamer’s mind, making him curious to search for its interpretations and know its various connotations according to its color and shape, and in this article we will refer to all scholars’ interpretations of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driverInterpretation of a dream about driving a car without a driver for a single woman may indicate that There is magic in her life and she needs to fortify herself to escape from its evil. If the dreamer sees a car driving without a driver, he may work in a job that does not suit his skills and practical experience. Lawyers warn a married woman who sees driving a car without a driver in her dream could be a sign of loss. Controlling problems and exacerbating marital disputes and feelings of anxiety and trouble. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver according to Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin, in interpreting a dream about driving a car without a driver, the following connotations: Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams of driving a car without a driver, this is a sign that he will follow a false model. It will lead him on a dark road that may cause his death. If you see a car driving without a driver in a dream, this may indicate the dreamer’s confusion and reluctance to make important decisions in his life. If the dreamer is engaged and sees in her dream a car driving without a driver, this may indicate misconduct. Her fiancé or his dry treatment of her. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver for individuals. Is the interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver good or bad for a single woman? If a single woman sees that a car is driving without a driver in her dream, she may be connected to a person who does not suit her in her personality, character, and thinking. Walking in Arabic In a girl’s dream without a leader, a vision that reflects her psychological turmoil due to the pressures of her social life at the level of family, acquaintances, and friends. If you see a car driving without a driver in someone’s dream, this may indicate bad luck and unhappiness. Seeing a car driving without a driver in a dream may symbolize The feeling of remorse that she did because of wrong actions in the previous period of her life and she will have to re-examine herself and correct her behavior. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car alone for individuals. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman driving a car safely, which indicates her strong leadership personality and her ability to take responsibility for herself. Whereas if a girl sees A car driving alone in a dream and having an accident, this may indicate a great disappointment. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman driving without a driver. Scientists do not praise a married woman who sees in her dream a car driving without a driver, as we see in the following interpretations: Interpretation of a dream of driving a car without a driver for a married woman It indicates that she is performing an invalid act without her husband’s knowledge. Seeing a car driving without a driver in a married woman’s dream may indicate the difficulty of living and the lack of livelihood. If a woman dreams of driving a car without a driver

title: Interpretation of a headband in a dream. The meaning of wearing a headband in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Buying a gold ring in a dream for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a single woman. The hair crown is a symbol in a dream. If a woman wears a gold or silver ring in her hair, the topic can be interpreted as a woman who is immoral towards her religion or that she is a bad woman. If a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing A collar on her head, it explains that she will be good with her husband. If a woman tightens a hair collar on her head in a dream, it shows knowledge, and also a collar in a dream on a woman’s head is a symbol of victory. If a merchant sees a hair collar in a dream, the subject indicates Profit and livelihood in trade. A woman's hairband in a dream may refer to her husband, but on the other hand, it may indicate stinginess or even developing friendship with people whose collar becomes their advisor in everything. Wearing a ring in your hair in a dream is a sign of wisdom, money, and obedience A woman is for her husband and being a good wife. If the dreamer with the collar is a man, this indicates his wife’s kindness to him and he is in the position of a strong, wealthy, knowledgeable and experienced husband. Whoever sees in his dream that it is tightly closed, this is evidence that he is miserable with himself and his family around him. If the dreamer is a woman The collar in her dream refers to her husband. If the ring is silver and the woman’s collar is wide, this indicates her husband’s generosity. But if he is thin and narrow, this indicates that her husband’s financial condition will get worse. If she sees that the necklace inserts some wood in the middle, this is evidence that her husband is a hypocrite. An iron collar in a woman’s dream is a sign of a strong husband. A ring in a merchant’s dream or a worker in the field of trade and business indicates profit and wealth. Whoever dreams that someone is wearing a collar, this is an indication of the friendship that will be built between these two people, and it will be stable and influential. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing a collar , or for a collar to be worn on it, this means that he will reach a high rank, and if his collar is studded, this indicates that his rank is higher than he expects. If you dream that you are wearing a completely golden collar, this means that you will get what you want. Whoever saw in a dream a collar around his neck He is miserable. The necklace represents a woman's kindness to her husband, and some of his money fell into her hands. A woman's collar is her husband. If it is of silver and wide, then the husband is generous, generous, and rich, if it is thin it shows his bad condition, if it is of iron then it is strong, and if it is of wood. In the middle, the man is a hypocrite. If a man is surrounded and is a merchant, then he is useful and prominent, and if the man is weak and is knowledgeable, then he hides knowledge. If he buys a slave with a silver collar around his neck, he will undertake profitable work. It was said: The collar is a corruption of religion, and wearing it indicates stinginess, wealth, children, and honesty. Seeing wearing a crown or a ring - YouTube

title: Interpretation of phlegm in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of phlegm in a dream by Ibn Sirin: It is worth noting that phlegm is one of the substances expelled from the mouth in humans, in addition to being a substance composed of saliva and mucus, which accompanies coughing as a result of the presence of infections in the bronchi and lungs, in addition to the fact that phlegm contains bacteria or viruses found in The body, and therefore the interpretation of the appearance of phlegm in a dream carries many interpretations that we explain through the topic in answer to the questions of a large number of people who dream of these dreams. Interpretation of phlegm in a dream by Ibn SirinIn fact, phlegm is considered a disgusting substance for many people, and therefore when they see it In dreams, the interpretation of phlegm in a dream is sought, so the mucous fluid contains many colors, which are interpreted in different forms, represented by the following: In general, phlegm in a dream indicates a lot of money that enters into the dreamer’s life. Thus, throwing it out indicates It indicates comfort, freedom from worries, and recovery from illness. Likewise, if it is from the mouth of a sheikh, it is a sign of the beneficial knowledge that a person will gain from that sheikh. However, if he sees him in a store or leaving a merchant, this indicates the merchant’s honesty in his dealings. On the other hand, the difficulty of removing it In a girl’s dream, it is an indication of the sadness that she experiences in her life. While it is difficult to achieve this in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign of the distress that befalls her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black and brown owl in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about difficulty passing phlegm in a dream, in addition to that The interpretation of seeing phlegm in a dream shows money, and therefore the more phlegm comes out, it shows a large amount of money, but if there is difficulty in getting it out of the mouth, it shows the obstacles that the person faces. The faces and interpretations are represented by the following: Therefore, the difficulty of expelling phlegm from the mouth is an indication of the obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life and in achieving his dreams. But if he sneaks out without anyone seeing this phlegm, this is a sign that he spent his money in secret. Also, if There is a lot of phlegm, so this is a sign that you are spending it in a bad way. See also: A detailed interpretation of a dream about a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about yellow phlegm coming out of the mouth. In addition, phlegm is a mucous fluid that comes out of the mouth as a result of an imbalance that a person is exposed to as a result of infection with a virus or bacteria, which It causes this phlegm to come out, so we will do that. I will explain to you the interpretation of seeing phlegm in a dream, which is as follows: It should be noted that seeing yellow phlegm coming out of the dreamer’s mouth indicates the financial hardship that the dreamer is suffering from. It also indicates a lack of birth in the sleep of a man or woman if it comes out in the house or in their bedroom and bed. If he sees it accompanied by a wet cough, it is a sign of the distress and fatigue that the household is suffering from. Also, the release of phlegm from a man’s mouth and its relief after that is a sign of relief from worries and the arrival of comfort in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying or a dead person crying

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream, according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: The appearance of the neck in a dream and the interpretation of its meaning. There is no doubt that seeing the neck in a dream is one of the visions that makes all women and girls, as well as men, want to interpret it and know more about it, and is it worthy of praise or not? Also, how do we know it is a good omen or a bad omen? All these questions related to the interpretation of the vision of the neck must be answered. Interpretation of the dream of the golden neck: When a man sees that he bought an earring and put it in one of his ears, this is evidence that God will give him a woman who will not marry another and will love her very much. If an unmarried woman sees that she took off her neck from her ears, then she feels With comfort and calm, it means that she will get rid of what has caused her anxiety and stress for a long time. This vision is praiseworthy and good news. About the condition and death of grief. Stealing a neck in a dream, whether married or unmarried, is evidence of unpleasant news that will cause grief to all family members. A gold earring in an individual’s dream means marriage soon, and in an unmarried woman’s dream there is an engagement and marriage as well, but it must To be happy with it in a dream. Wearing an earring in a dream is good and money will come soon. Interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees in her dream that she has elegant earrings in her ears, this means that God will provide her husband with abundant money and goodness will prevail in All family members. It is not preferable for a married woman to dream of her neck being stolen, and this means that the coming period of her life will not be happy at all and she will face many challenges and difficulties. If a married woman sells her earrings in a dream, this is evidence of her divorce from her husband as a result of the many problems between them during the period. Next.When a married woman dreams that her husband has bought her a gold earring and a silver earring, this means that she has two children, a male and a female. Buying a necklace in a dreamIf a married woman sees that someone she knows is buying her earrings in a dream, this is evidence that this person He wants to attract her and get close to her. When a mother sees that she is buying a gold ring and her son has already traveled abroad for a long time, this vision indicates that her son will return to his homeland and live with her and will not return to travel again. If a woman sees in her dream that her brother has bought her a gold earring This is evidence that she will find help and support from her brother throughout her life. If an unemployed bachelor sees that he has bought a new earring, this means that he will get a job that compensates him for his poor living and lack of money. If an unemployed bachelor sees in his dream that he is standing in front of gold and finds an earring that he likes So he decides to go to the store to buy it, and this is evidence that he will meet a girl he admires and loves, and he will love her immediately. He married her. If a married man sees himself buying a large golden earring with clusters of diamonds on it, this is good news for him that God will give him abundant money to the point of wealth. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get On the correct interpretations.Loss of the neck

title: Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister as a bride in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my deceased sister, a bride in a dream. Interpretation scholars have placed different meanings in the interpretation of a dream about my deceased sister, a bride in a dream. Below we present all of this and more details. Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister, a bride in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister, a bride in a dream, may be a sign of bliss. What you are experiencing, and God knows best. When you see your dead sister in a dream, this may indicate forgiveness, and God knows the unseen. Just as an unmarried girl sees her deceased sister in a dream as a bride, this may represent the girl’s kindness, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees his deceased sister as a bride and cries, this may lead to better circumstances. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my dead aunt alive in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my dead aunt alive in a dream can lead to the renewal of wishes, and God knows the unseen. When you see a dead aunt alive, it may represent one’s return after loss, and God knows all that is not seen. You both see that seeing A married woman whose deceased aunt returns to life may indicate the return of stolen rights, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, if a young man sees that his deceased aunt returns to life, this may be a sign that he will be able to restore order after his death, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hugging a mother A dead woman in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about hugging a dead mother in a dream may indicate ease after hardship and that God has all knowledge. The dreamer also sees embracing a dead mother in a dream may express a mood of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a dead mother in her arms in a dream, it may be This is a sign that she will be relieved of her worries, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the arms of a dead mother may mean getting rid of anxiety, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s death laughing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister laughing in a dream can lead to bliss and a good state after death, and God knows best. Where she sees her sister The deceased laughing may indicate her happiness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a married man sees his dead sister laughing in a dream, this may indicate comfort, and God knows the unseen. When you see your deceased sister laughing loudly in a dream, this may be evidence of a lack of religion, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister’s engagement in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my dead sister’s engagement in a dream could indicate bliss, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her dead sister’s engagement in a dream, it may represent her marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees a dead sister’s engagement in a dream, he can bypass the sister’s place, and God knows best. The UnseenAlso, seeing a sister’s engagement indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. I dreamed of my dead sister’s niece in a dream. I dreamed of my deceased sister’s niece in a dream, and we did not find specific explanations to see this, except that seeing the dead person in a dream may be a sign of his need to beg and seek forgiveness, and God knows the unseen. If the dead dreamer sees a happy person In a dream, this may indicate what he is blessed with, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a niece in a dream can also indicate happiness and stability, and God has

If the dead dreamer sees a happy person In a dream, this may indicate what he is blessed with, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about kissing a nephew in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of kissing a nephew in a dream. Many people search for the meaning of seeing someone kissing him, especially if this person is his nephew. Seeing a nephew kissing explains the great bond between a nephew and a fortune teller. It also indicates the strength of the relationship between them and the enjoyment of love, tenderness and compassion that can To exist between them. It also indicates the dreamer’s mercy with his brother’s permission and kindness to him. It also means providing assistance and communicating with his nephew in front of him. Interpretation of a dream about kisses and hugs: If the fortuneteller knows the face of the person before him, this indicates mutual benefit between the fortuneteller and this person, and the acquisition of many good things. It is also in a state of unknown identity. As for the dreamer, and the dreamer receives a kiss in a dream, this indicates how happy this dreamer is, and the doors of goodness open in his face, and life turns to him. Seeing a kiss in a dream means how much the dreamer needs love, tenderness, and a sense of security from the people around him. Also, seeing a kiss in a dream means how much the dreamer needs love, tenderness, and a sense of security from the people around him. A kiss from a loved one shows how much the dreamer desires love and feels comfort from that person. Interpretation: Seeing a kiss on the cheek is great desire and comfort for that person. Also, seeing a kiss on the neck shows the dreamer’s interest in a person who has all the feelings of love and wants to communicate with him. I would like to see only A kiss in her dream shows her desire In marriage and engagement. It also indicates the progress of a person who wants to be in a relationship with her, but is not good at expressing his feelings for fear of rejection. If a girl sees that someone is kissing her and she is happy about that, this indicates her connection to the person she loves and she has all feelings of love and tenderness. But if she sees that someone kissed her on the mouth, and she is not satisfied with that, and she is not satisfied with that, then this is because of her relationship with someone she does not want, and she is getting married against her will. Seeing a single girl hugging in a dream indicates how much she desires the person she loves, how much she desires to communicate with him, and sincerity. With which she chose this person with great conviction and love. Seeing kisses and hugs may be evidence of the dreamer entering into an illicit relationship, so he resorts to seeking forgiveness and repentance and staying away from this sinful relationship. Interpretation of a strong hug in a dream. Seeing a hug in a dream is evidence of the extent of the fortuneteller’s desire and love for the person he is treating. Also, seeing a person sitting on someone’s lap indicates the protection and comfort that the dreamer feels near that person. Also, seeing someone you do not know hugging in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s attachment to illusion and empowerment. Embracing an unknown woman in a dream is interpreted as It is a connection to the world, love and attachment to the world. Interpretation of a father’s embrace of love and the support and support that a father provides to his children. See also: - Interpretation of a girl’s dream of kissing a girl with her mouth. Seeing a sister hugging in a dream indicates sister tenderness and the kindness and love that she feels towards the viewer. The embrace in the dream shows the similarity of conditions and circumstances between the dreamer and the person who Hug him. Also, seeing someone suffocating due to the intensity of the hug indicates a lot of crying due to the separation that the viewer suffered. While explaining the kisses of great love, it may mean accepting someone you care about or love.

title: Interpretation of eating meat in a dream for a single and pregnant woman

preview.html: Find out the interpretation of eating meat in a dream, what are its implications in reality, seeing food in general in a dream is sometimes ambiguous, as it may indicate to some that it is good because the food is food from God, and others may think that this dream shows the dreamer’s desire for this type of food, But seeing and eating meat brings us many interpretations that we need to know through an encyclopedia where we present to you the interpretation of this dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.Interpretation of eating meat in a dreamInterpretation of eating meat in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin presented different interpretations of this dream, so let us consider the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream. Sirin for meat depends on the following cases: If a man sees in a dream that he is eating bird meat, then this vision indicates kindness, livelihood, and earning money. Eating uncooked meat in a dream indicates illegal acquisition of money. Ibn Sirin interpreted eating the meat of a large calf in a dream as evidence On the abundance of food that he will obtain soon, and God knows best, and that the vision indicates escape from dangers, success, and success. Also, eating camel meat in a dream indicates earning a lot of money if the camel is fat, but in the case of losing weight, the vision indicates obtaining For a little money, and God knows best. Eating beef stew symbolizes missed opportunities in reality. Interpretation of eating meat in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen presented many interpretations regarding eating raw meat, and we will learn about the most prominent of these interpretations as follows: Eating uncooked red meat in The dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many health problems, and God knows best. Seeing eating raw meat in a dream among family members indicates sins and gossip, and also indicates obtaining money through illegal means. Eating raw beef indicates that the fortuneteller will be exposed to many... Difficult problems in reality, as eating goat meat is evidence of illness, and God knows best. Eating raw meat while enjoying its taste indicates illegal acquisition of money. Interpretation of meat consumption for unmarried womenIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating uncooked meat, this vision It indicates something unpleasant, which is the presence of a failed relationship in her life, and God knows best, because it symbolizes her being exposed to difficult problems in general. Reality. Eating beef in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she heard good news in reality, and God knows best. Seeing eating lamb meat in an unmarried woman’s dream means that you will get money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating meat for a pregnant womanEating cooked meat in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman indicates ease of childbirth, and God knows best. A dream about eating uncooked red meat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the imminent date of delivery. We provide you with the most important interpretations of eating meat in a dream, and we must note that the science of dream interpretation generally depends on the jurisprudence of scholars, and we cannot be sure that These interpretations will come true mainly because only God knows the unseen. To interpret another dream, you can download the following application

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating butter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating butter Dear reader, you can learn about the interpretation of seeing eating butter. It may also interest you to know that you are lost on the road in a dream. As butter is one of the most important nutritional supplements that a woman needs in her kitchens every day, so a large number of people want to know the interpretation of the appearance of butter urgently and know the details of this dream. We quote lines from this article. Seeing butter in a dream indicates a lot of money and lawful food. Seeing spoiled butter in a dream indicates loss and failure for the dreamer. Seeing buying butter in a dream indicates a lot of profit for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing eating butter. Interpretation of seeing drinking butter for a married woman. All the details related to the appearance of butter in a dream for a married woman can be identified, and through it many interpretations can be obtained, the most important of which are the following: Eating butter in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her marital life in an excellent way. Butter in a dream indicates the goodness and wealth that will come to the dreamer in an unusual way in his life. Buying butter from a married woman in her dream indicates that she will achieve one of the goals she seeks to achieve. Melting butter in a dream for a married woman can be a sign of a dispute between her and her husband. The white foam in a dream indicates that her children They will reach great positions in their future. The presence of yellow foam in a dream indicates that someone wants to cause trouble for the dreamer. Yellow foam in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of her child’s health. title: Interpretation of a dream about a mother according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
I like itFansSubscribedFans Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream is good if she dies, because Ibn Sirin said that she comes and gives you good news if she is satisfied and happy in the dream, but if she is in need, then she is in need. Your prayer or arrival in your stomach, while dreaming of a living mother in a dream is considered bad. Because it is an indication of what is bothering her, or what makes her angry, and the evidence for Ibn Sirin’s mother in a dream is as follows. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream: A mother in a dream refers to the dreamer’s life and expresses his psychological and physical health. A single mother in a dream means that she is psychologically disturbed and needs to feel comfortable and safe. If the mother dies in a dream, and in reality she is alive, this means obstacles that you are going through and you need your mother’s guidance or call. A happy mother in a dream means happy events that will happen to you and you need to share these events with your mother. If the mother is alive Life and she has grown up in reality, and she dreamed of her in a dream, it means her desire for you and her desire to see you. If a girl sees her mother in a dream and her body is beautiful, this means that her mother is satisfied with her. My mother’s words with you mean good events that will change your life. Interpretation of a dream about a single motherIf a single mother is found If his mother is sitting on her feet or standing in a corner of the house, this means that you will have many good things, but if he finds that your mother is giving birth to you, this means that. The situation turned from bad to good. If you feel upset or suffer from poverty, this vision means that your condition will turn into wealth or relief in your worries, and if you are sick, the interpretation of a dream about a mother here means a quick recovery. Interpretation of seeing a mother’s sadness in a dreamInterpretation of dreams for a mother Sad and frowning means that you have disobeyed your mother or that she is dissatisfied with you. If the mother dies, then the mother’s sadness here means severing the womb, especially the womb on the mother’s side. A dead mother came in a dream and she is angry, this indicates the bad things she does and these actions make her angry. Interpretation Dreams of a single mother: The symbol of a mother in a dream for an unmarried woman.
If your mother is alive and you are the one who travels in the house, when this house is an advertisement for you, the sign that your mother is trying to do so, or of whom it is that I don't know. Whereas if your mother dies Seeing your mother in a dream means good luck for you, if she is happy, while she and your deceased mother came in your dream and she is sad, it means that you left your mother’s house. Memory, or the need for prayer and seeking forgiveness. Interpretation of a dream about a crying mother: Dreaming about a mother crying and your mother alive means that some illness will affect her for some time, especially if she cries loudly or loudly. If your mother dies and she cries in a dream, this means an illness that afflicts the dreamer. Dreaming of a mother screaming at you means shameful actions that bother her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a mother’s breast and her crying. Solution stitches. The source of the dead mother. He cries for her and wants alms for her. If the mother is alive, then the dream indicates that the dreamer desires her. If he travels, the dreamer accepts a

title: Interpretation for a mother of forty-four children who walked in my clothes in a dream

preview.html: Contents: I dreamed of forty-four mother insects under my clothes on my body, Sirin, for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, bitten by a black forty-four dead mother in the house. Meaning of forty-four mother insects in a dream. If you dreamed of an insect or forty-four insects that got into your clothes and tried to kill them and you said so, then the dream It means that there are women around you who are not accepting and are trying to interfere in your private life and you will do so. Keep them away from you, God willing. The forty-four insect is a deceitful person who has no good or deceitful enemy, and whoever sees this insect in a dream his enemy appears, and whoever sees it killing him, he will soon get rid of this person and the evil will go away. Far-forty-four insects in a dream mean a prediction of sadness, anxiety, and betrayal of friends or relatives. A soon-to-be age may appear, known to God, but he is an enemy and a jealous person who will not be silenced by charity or good relations. Killing a mother of forty-four children in a dream means overcoming and defeating the damage that would have occurred. If you dreamed that a mother of four Forty children bite you and you cannot get rid of the insect, this means that it is close to your relatives and will harm you, and therefore you cannot get rid of it. It was said: Its interpretation is two women fighting and she is jealous of you in the house, which indicates goodness, but he is hated and malicious in the first place. Interpretation of the dream: You have to be Beware of a woman who enters your home and causes you problems, and you may discover another person like her. It may mean that you have mental fatigue such as envy and the evil eye, and you need to strengthen yourself and legal advancement and adhere to it. It may mean that you have someone who is lagging behind in his religion in your home, your family, or your relatives. Interpretation of the vision of a forty-four-year-old mother - YouTube
